name: bojler
description: Bojler is an email framework for developing responsive and lightweight email templates that will render correctly across each of the most popular email clients.
author: Slicejack (https://github.com/Slicejack)

scripts.build:
node-sass scss/main-inline.scss dist/main-inline.css && node-sass scss/main-embed.scss dist/main-embed.css && echo '

scripts.test: stylelint --config .stylelintrc --syntax scss "scss/**/*.scss" && node-sass scss/main-inline.scss > /dev/null && node-sass  scss/main-embed.scss > /dev/null && echo 'Test was successful!'
